is a good way to visit the city. You can go from Manila and many other cities.
2GO Travel have Boats going to Manila, Cebu, Tagbilaran.
Cokaliong Shipping Lines go to Cebu city, Iligan,
The Labo airport re-opened in 2007 with one daily Philippines airlines flight to and from Manila. Cebu Pacific is also flying daily to Manila and daily to Cebu.
Tricycle is a cheap way to get around.

value: content=For catholic religious people, it was believe that the Virgin Mary at Cotta shrine shows miracle during the Spanish era and ever since people go to this place for prayers, blessings, and wishes.
content=An old Spanish war defensive fortress.
name=Dolphin Island at Misamis Occidental Aquamarine Park

content=This place is a great way to enjoy swimming, dolphin watching and feeding, fish feeding, and snorkling. The place is located in the shallow seas but far from beaches. To reach this place a boat ride is needed at Misamis Occidental Aquamarine Park (MOAP), Tudela, Misamis Occidental.
content=has a McDonalds and a Cinema.
alt=La Veranda Restaurant - Royal Garden Hotel
address=Burgos corner Zamora Sts. Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines

content=Savour famed Filipino specialties and appetizing authentic Chinese dishes amidst a relaxing atmosphere adorned with refreshing greenery and white latticework. An ideal dining place for small parties , business meetings or leisurely get-togethers.
address=Jose P. Rizal St., Ozamiz City
content=Moon Cafe is a Mexican themed restaurant. They served Mexican foods, pizzas, steaks, sizzlers, and many more.
address=Circumferencial road cor. Don A. Bernard Ave., Ozamiz City
content=Famous for their grilled foods with unlimited rice.
content=Serves great pizzas at cheap prize. They also make pizza with more than 20 inches in diameter.
content=The restaurant is famous in chinese foods.
name=Naomi’s Botanical Garden and Tourist Inn

content=The garden has now become one of Ozamis’ attractions. The nursery of Naomi’s Botanical Garden has grown to become one of the biggest supplier of plants used for landscaping in Mindanao. The environment afforded by the greenery surrounding the building has made it a favorite venue for different community activities, conferences and weddings. It now has three reception halls for these events.
address=Cebedo St. (In front of Banco de Oro)
content=Affordable inn with clean rooms and 24 hrs service. They also have cheap food with many choices.
content=A/C single and double rooms with own bathrooms and cable TV. The GV Hotel Ozamis has 62 rooms.
content=47 fan/A/C single and double rooms with own bathrooms.
